website_summaries.verdict: A combination cash box that works well for keeping extra money handy at home.
pros: Locks with a combination and has a handle
Can store coins, bills, and some other small valuables
Code on the combination lock is easy to set
cons: It's not as large as some other choices, so a few people wanting to lock up larger items have been dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Does Not fit personal diary/journals
customer_reviews.text: Great little cash box with combo code......However, I purchased this box for my tween daughter to keep her personal journal locked up. (her father reads her journal & punishes her if she expresses her negative feelings about him in it) Most journal sizes do not fit in this box so we will need to repurchase a bigger one....FYI: everyone has a personal right to express & release their own feelings & thoughts without being punished!
customer_reviews.author: MamColo

customer_reviews.title: Too much Fortnite or Snapchat! Great spot for phone
customer_reviews.text: I love these- good price- combination- so no missing keys- you can store lots of things. I originally bought to store children $$ etc but - It quicky became the place to put their phones when they overuse/ misbehave/ doing homework etc. I was tired of hiding devices and forgetting where I hid them this time!! Now I just have to remember combination :))
customer_reviews.author: DebM

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I like this box because its small buy still gets the job done. Perfect for what i need it for. Overall im super happy with my purchase. If i ever need to buy anothe, i will buy it with this seller
customer_reviews.author: Yee Kuen Ho

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for the color. Kept it for the usability.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever lock box that I have for myself and I’m impressed. I have important documents like my SS card and passport and birth certificate in the bottom half and even a lot of cash and jewelry. I’m genuinely surprised by how much room is in this little box. I also love that it comes in pink. And let’s be honest that’s the real reason I even got this little guy. Also I didn’t realize it was a “cash box” necessarily but either way it achieves its intended purpose using it as a storage box instead. Love it. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Good cash box for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cash box for my kids to use instead of a piggy bank. It's perfect for that purpose. It's compact and easy to store. There is a hard, plastic, removable tray which is perfect for storage of coins or jewelry. There is ample room under the tray to store bills. The combination lock works well and eliminates the risk of losing keys. This cash box is probably too small to use for business purposes but works fine for storage of valuables at home.
customer_reviews.author: KTK

customer_reviews.title: No more crayons all over the floor when mommas not looking 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small box for my daughter's crayons, glue, and scissors etc. I wish I could have bought a larger size since I couldn't fit as much as I wanted. However, a small case 24ct crayons, small/regular scissors, and a few pencils would fit just fine. I only bring out this box when it's time for homework 'cause she will lose all her crayons and such things inless than two days! -- so yeah, this is the ready-homework box. I really LOVE this little box -- I think it would make a great small lunch box too. Furthermore, it's very easy to set the combination lock. I'd love to get the larger size too.
customer_reviews.author: Magda

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's boyfriend who has a little brother getting into his spare change and a few items he treasures. The little brother isn't very happy with me, now....but the boy friend thinks I'm great! ;-) It was just the right size for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids. I love these cash boxes! You can change the combination as often as you want. My kids are constantly sneaking up 😂 on one another and figuring out their siblings combinations, so this is super easy to change as often as you like! Very sturdy, and larger than the previous cash boxes we have owned. The have a removable trays on top and lots of additional space underneath. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price and company backs their product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cash lock box for the price. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 stars because after having it less than a month the combination part of the box broke. I couldn’t get the numbers to catch when rolling it to put in my combination so therefore I couldn’t turn the knob to unlock the box. However I messaged the company and they were very nice and sent me a new one right away. I will tell you this though, I had to break into the one that broke and i didn’t think I was ever going to get into it 😂 but you eventually can.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Efficent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box as a smaller option for holding medication for a trip out of the country. It was big enough to hold my meds, and small enough to squeeze into the bottom of my carry-on so I didn't have to worry about my medication in my luggage. I still use this, the lock works great, much more efficient than a lock box with a key. Also it is pretty, glossy, and generally made well.
customer_reviews.author: Allina Diaz

customer_reviews.title: It's a mix between novelty and security
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to keep some knick knacks in it as well as put some money aside. I loved the color when I opened the amazon box so you can imagine how bummed i was when I saw there was a chip already when I got it. Its not really for durability for meant to last long. It would be good for kids to teach responsibility or elderly for medications .
customer_reviews.author: Hubish

customer_reviews.title: Cashbox, not a safe
customer_reviews.text: These are typical "cash boxes" to use for events or places where a little cash needs to be available. We are using for our children to learn about savings and allowances. Secure enough for "around the house", but nothing special when it comes to public security. I chose so we would have different colors and the children like them -- but not much different from typical combination-lock, cash boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Chaser

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: You have to use some common sense and know right off the bat, this isn’t going to be the type of lock box that’s going to keep out a criminal. I bought it to keep in my room, so my cash doesn’t get stolen from whoever might come in. For the price, it does the job & I’m happy with it. The code is super easy to set. Comes with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Darling

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but closing mech a problem
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality sturdy box, but the closing mechanism is difficult and doesn't want to engage the lock in order to close it. I have to jiggle it around while trying to turn it to close and finally get it to engage. Not sure if they are all this way or if I just got a faulty one. The numbers are clear and easy to line up, so that part works well. Nice not to have to bother with yet another key.
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good for Business
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. I use it to keep anything I want others to not be able to take. It also assures people that what they hand me for safety is safe. Because of how easy it is to change the combination, I change it regularly especially if I've opened it in front of too many people.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hide your secrets.
customer_reviews.text: The box is good size for me to put multiple things, such as medication, jewelry, cash....keep out of my kids. Easy to hide it Under my bed or in the closet. Can open the box by key or code. It’s convenient me if I lose the key. For the price, it’s worth it and decently made.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Nicely made. Very safe and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold medicine and it's the perfect size. The lock is very easy to set and use and very sturdy. I have the colors pink and blue and the blue is so cute. Perfect size and price! If you take the cash tray out it holds a normal size pill bottle perfectly. Could probably hold about 10 normal sized pill bottles from the pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the weight to it. It feels sturdy and well made. I had to decorate mine so that it would stand out but it will be great for vendor events knowing my profits are secured. Thank you! Oh and also the instructions for changing and setting your combination were so easy to follow
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: This product although it does serves its purpose is unsafe. The edges are very sharp and will cut you if not careful. I sent and email to the seller to see what could be done but instead of working something out I was told to buy another one. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: MangoEater

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made maney safe
customer_reviews.text: This money safe is made of thin steel plate, and looks very cheap. We have an old money safe which looks much more expensive and sturdy. Money deserves better than this. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. MUROYAMA

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute cash box!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, wont stop someone from breaking it. It’s a really good cash box and so cute because it’s colorful. The lock is good quality, easy to change the code. I messed up and didn’t get the correct number in clicked in place figured it was one number off and changed it to what I wanted. I also fully removed the drawer to use as a little lockbox.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I was hoping to get something for my grandkids like what my children had. But theses are horribly made. Even the handle is bolted on crooked. As I sent them to my grandkids that live out of the country they would be difficult to return. They will probably be thrown out and I’ll have to purchase something else!
customer_reviews.author: laurie schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Nice to keep the honest people honest
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and one for my daughter to put our cash in instead of it just lying around in our rooms. This is just to prevent the temptation when friends are over, cleaning lady, bug guy, etc. if a thief really wants contents it won’t be hard for them. All in all a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Order 3 last year for Christmas gifts and recorder this year 3 more . Better than giving a Piggy 🐷 bank . But my Christmas cash 💵 inside plus coins ! Better than a gift card .
customer_reviews.author: Patti Webb

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lock, weird sized money tray.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item mainly to stash cash, so I was especially interested in the money tray to hold my bills. The tray doesn’t fit US-sized currency. The wording on the box it came in was weird, the grammar was incorrect. It was shipped to me in a giant envelope rather than a box. Then I tried to set my combination. It immediately malfunctioned and the lock wouldn’t even turn so I could set it. Now it is permanently unlocked. 000 doesn’t even fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve N.

customer_reviews.title: Serves it purpose, good for price!
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money, only problem I had was that the lock didn't set to the combination I chose. I had to go back through all of the possibilities to get it back open.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Graves

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Just got my package delivered and my lockbox is dented on the side. The package was in fine condition. Just disappointed in the condition of my new item.
customer_reviews.author: NReg

customer_reviews.title: Does the job somewhat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to lock up some extra cash. Does the job but the lock is kind of loose and could easily be broken. Also don't recommend putting change in this. Did that once and the change got too close to the lock and I was unable to turn the lock and had to spend some time trying to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: My son opens and closes by himself more fun for them less annoying for parents
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing I will never order a child’s first safe from anywhere else after getting this. My son is 7 and after opening this not 1 other gift could he think about as he lives to save money and collect little things like crystals ect
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect money stash
customer_reviews.text: The item is very strong good quality and big enough for a lot of things and it's very good priced. However, sometimes it does not open with the code you have to wiggle around with it.
customer_reviews.author: Riz Malik.

customer_reviews.title: Great little box
customer_reviews.text: Great little box. So far it’s held up fine. Sturdy. Has the option of changing the code. Easy to handle. Great for my kids to keep it organize their money in
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 👌
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lock box, I love it because it has a combination instead of a key. I don't have to worry about getting a key out to unlock it every time or worry about loosing a key and it's made very well/good quality and it's a very sturdy box.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Needed it for my controlled substance medication. This was perfect up until the lock malfunctioned & I had to break it to get to my meds. I would recommend it if the lock didnt get stuck. If you're looking for it for methadone I get 13 bottles and they fit no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Right price and good quality. I'm actually surprised by how solid this is.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Vokits

customer_reviews.title: Security plus
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect, given as a gift, our niece loved it, stores her valuables to keep from snooping siblings!
customer_reviews.author: myvoteisgood

customer_reviews.title: Broken Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get the latch to go up no matter how hard I tried - and was not able to set my own combination —tried all the tricks listed online and in the reviews too. this is a faulty made product. Don’t waste yr money.
customer_reviews.author: pryindeezpeace

customer_reviews.title: Inside Damage!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping box arrived no damage. But the tray inside the lock box was broken. The manufacturer has poor QC in place!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: I have teenage kids that like to go through my things...this keeps prying eyes and fingers away from anything you don't want the kids around.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Arrived already broken. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The safe has a handle on top, I guess for people who like carrying their safes around. Mine arrived with the handle broken off in such a way that there is a hole on top of the safe, making it worthless. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Baker

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my sons to keep their cash and small valuables safe from each other. The locks were easy to program and work great. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock box.
customer_reviews.text: This cute box is a great way to secure anything from money to jewelry. The color is a perfect pink and you never have to worry about losing a key because it's a combination lock.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Value and even Greater Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The money box is very sturdy and will easily last for years through its day-to-day use. We had some questions for the seller and they were both quick to respond and extremely fast to come up with a solution that ensured that we were satisfied customers. I'd recommend purchasing through this seller!
customer_reviews.author: B DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really cute to use for my 5 year old daughters jewelry box so her brothers can’t get in it! It’s easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: jeni

customer_reviews.title: Locking mechanism does NOT line up without manipulation.
customer_reviews.text: The side of box that contains the locking mechanism doesn't line up without manipulation. Because of this I cannot recommend this lockbox without trepidation.
customer_reviews.author: TrashCityPDX

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and keeps items safe from little ones
customer_reviews.text: I love this to hold my medication and things I need my kids to stay out of - love that it’s pink.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, great value and quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: forest

customer_reviews.title: Saving money in style
customer_reviews.text: In love with this cash box!!! Aesthetically pleasing and I keep all of my cash in it!!! Definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Sturdy little cash box. Little bit big enough for unfolded cash and several jewelry little cases. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Eslava

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The lock is a little whimsy but we’re using it to keep our medications locked up, so it works for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Melinie Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Unlocking Issues
customer_reviews.text: Set the combination according to instructions. Got it to open once then it wouldn’t unlock after that. No guide or instructions on what to do then. Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great cash box
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot, The only thing I didn’t like is setting the passcode was a little bit of a pain in the butt and the metal is very thin its not like a thick metal it can easily dent if u slam it, but its 15$ so Other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lock-away-box
customer_reviews.text: Great little box what's more impressive is the follow up I reviewed from the company to insure all is well in using it! Very simple to personalize your combination, and the price couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahbella

customer_reviews.title: Fun little box
customer_reviews.text: Got the boxes for the grandkids to start helping them save money. Small enough and simple enough that little people can use them. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Vern H

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved the safe!
customer_reviews.text: The safe was well made and will stand up to kids being rough. The kids (6 and 7) spent hours playing with their safes!
customer_reviews.author: Truth seeker

customer_reviews.title: Cute & just the right size!...
customer_reviews.text: Such a CUTE little lock box. I looked allllll over on amazon searching for the right size and this was PERFECT! I’m soooo glad I ended up ignoring some of the negative reviews and bought this. I purchased the white one :).
customer_reviews.author: Monique Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Employee Approved
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set and needed something simple for my staff to keep controlled keys in. Even the most particulars did not have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt trust anything super important in it
customer_reviews.text: Its okay, I wouldnt trust anything super important in it. You could break/bend it open with a butter knife if you wanted too.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jigsaw

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described and more durable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S. McGough

customer_reviews.title: This box does not work
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I set my code it does work but the box will not lock again. It does not stay latched when it’s open either. Am I doing something wrong? The lever A and B will not move when opened
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars! Excellent quality and fits my personal Stuff Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cash box! Great quality and is not too heavy. Easy to store as well!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small enough to take around
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for storing jewelry and other electronic items that I purchased on Amazon. Very personal. Compact with a handle and I thought it was worth it. Bought another one after purchasing the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Cute box for small amounts of money
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, does the job. Mainly for small amounts of money or putting away personal money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Bad for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Light plastic. Anyone could pop this open with a screwdriver
customer_reviews.author: My Hummel OpinionTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, helpful people. We have the new one now, and it works flawlessly! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Keenan R Kros

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Good material and very easy to setup ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good material and very easy to setup the new password. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carneiro

customer_reviews.title: I would say yes
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's deeper than most of the lock boxes and not easy to break into.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy mailbox.
customer_reviews.text: The mailbox is same as described. It is very good quality, a thick metal shell, firm locking function, and it can be opened and closed easily. Easy installation. Very satisfied with this mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nelson

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: we sue this everyday at the office. works perfect. great value
customer_reviews.author: Scott Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Really handy for college dorms
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one because it wouldn't lock, but received a new one which works really well for storing prescriptions and other small items
customer_reviews.author: Carla wendy

customer_reviews.title: Quality safe
customer_reviews.text: The safe is exactly as described. Very inexpensive for its price. Easy to set new combination.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. English

customer_reviews.title: Defective Locks
customer_reviews.text: 5 of the boxes that I ordered were defective. We are unable to lock them and the seller will not take them back. So we are stock with these boxes and a loss of almost $100
customer_reviews.author: Sally Nwafor

customer_reviews.title: Love the combination lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set or change combination pin, great quality and the perfect size for someone wanting to store it in a desk drawer or someplace similar
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cant open
customer_reviews.text: Sad I missed the window to return. I ordered two one works great with my youngest son. The second one locked on him and i cant do anything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a basic lock box for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Compact, It Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little lock box for a few valuables. Good size (small, compact) to fit in dresser drawer Easy to set combination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: combo lock didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn't open the box until 2 months after my purchase so I am unable to return this cheap lock box. Combo lock doesn't work. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Mini low income box
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping small valuables in. Sadly, the locking mechanism doesn’t lock when I’m done with it. Still keeping it. Very sturdy and like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Ramos

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: was perfeft for exactly what i needed it for. sturdy and able to keep all my medications in. perfect! would recommend for anyone look for a safe way to secure their belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Keep meds safe!
customer_reviews.text: This product is PERFECT for keeping hands out of my medications! This shipping was lightning fast. It is ideal that you may reset the combination anytime you want.
customer_reviews.author: Meri L

customer_reviews.title: Convenience size
customer_reviews.text: Just received so no wear and tear yet. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie

customer_reviews.title: Lock works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little lock box. It works great and was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars,good
customer_reviews.text: Great safe, very sturdy and strong. Excellent quality and easy to store where ever you want. I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Eli mirabal

customer_reviews.title: Secret stash box for a young girl with a snoopy brother
customer_reviews.text: The classic white color will work nicely in a young girl's room. Trinkets, cash or "secret" favorites are kept safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Becker

customer_reviews.title: Lock Broke
customer_reviews.text: The “lock” mechanism cracked and broke after a few uses. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but.......
customer_reviews.text: Overall item was good, but the numbers on lock were a little beat up other than that excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Cash Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very strong and attractive box. The handle is firm and the slots are big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Good use
customer_reviews.text: The little shelf that comes with it isn’t good to hold change fyi but i love the box all around and is really sturdy and seemingly resistant to water.
customer_reviews.author: Ki

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves her lock box, and I don’t have to worry about losing a key
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is a great place to keep medication locked away
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gray

customer_reviews.title: the lock on this is defective
customer_reviews.text: the lock on this is defective and i could not return it because it was over 30 days do not buy
customer_reviews.author: sicilygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great little lock box!!!
customer_reviews.text: My eleven year old daughter needed a place to lock up her valuables, this box is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: I got a defect. I would like a new one please
customer_reviews.author: Kiara Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Would think the box would be larger
customer_reviews.text: I felt the safe was a lil to small not what I expected but works for now
customer_reviews.author: Franchize

customer_reviews.title: Cheap combo lock jams
customer_reviews.text: The combination lock jammed after two weeks of use. Can't reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Serrano

customer_reviews.text: The money tray is just very slightly too small for cash to fit perfectly inside, but its a pretty good product overall
customer_reviews.author: dksdkfls

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to set.
customer_reviews.text: Compact and Lightweight. Easy to set the alarm. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jose B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made and the lock mechanism broke after 1 day. Id recommend a better quality lock box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.  Lock jammed after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and decent workmanship for the price point. I needed a metal lock box to keep my meds in. Works out perfectly for my weekly plastic pillbox organizers and keeps them safely locked away from my 3 year old Grand daughter. REvISED. Took box with my meds on a cruise. Put code in and would not open. Had to ask room attendant for screw driver to open. Box was destroyed in process. I can no longer recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lee from PA

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This cash box/safe is perfect for anyone looking to secure smaller items, without having to take up a lot of shelf space in the process. We got this for my son so he could keep his wallet and cell phone locked up when he is not in his dorm room. If you take out the cash tray, you can put a cell phone, wallet, and a box of gift cards in the box comfortably and still have some extra space. He says the combination lock was very easy to program, and this is exactly what we were looking for. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Cup

customer_reviews.title: This is going to last!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cash box. I hesitated about buying it because of the size, but now I'm glad I did. It's VERY sturdy. Holds everything I need and because of its size doesn't take up much room. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

product_meta.title: Decaller Cash Box with Combination Lock, Safe Metal Small Locking Box with Money Tray, 7 4/5" x 6 4/5" x 3 3/5", Black, QH2004S
feature_bullets: Combination Lock: Cash box has an advanced combination lock to keep valuables safe, steel material is more flexible and durable than plastic. It’s perfect for outdoors without worry of the cash spill out
Removable Money Tray: Cash box has an interior cash tray with five compartments to help organize coins, keys, rings. The bottom of the money box can help to store checks, receipts and valuables
Sturdy Handle: Metal material is reliable for cash lock box, resistant to damage from drops and impacts. Equipped with a convenient carrying handle so that you can carry locking cash box easily
Size and Color: 7.87 x 6.89 x 3.7 inches, black. Perfect safe lock box for festivals, supermarket cashier, fundraisers and more. Curved edges to make it comfortable and safe to hold
Perfect Money Box: New design for indoor and outdoor use. Such as School, Supermarket, Storage Lockers, Cabinets, Family, Yard Sale and so on. Suitable to store bills, coins, checks and receipts
